hero-description: Connect with local businesses, discover financial services, and join a community that supports your economic growth and prosperity.
features-subtitle: Reliability, Accessibility, Modern Facilities, Transparency, Community Focus, and Professional Management.
feature-reliability-desc: Secure cooperative licensed under Nepal's Cooperative Act with proven track record since 2007.
feature-accessibility-desc: Easy savings and credit services for all members with flexible deposit and withdrawal options.
feature-modern-desc: Digital banking, ATM, online transactions, and contemporary banking solutions.
feature-transparency-desc: Regular audits, financial reporting, and transparent operations for member confidence.
products-subtitle: Discover quality products from our member businesses
quick-actions-member-login-desc: Access your account and banking services
quick-actions-events-desc: Book tickets for workshops and events
about-hero-subtitle: Together, everyone can achieve more - A trusted platform for shared growth, financial empowerment, and strong relationships
office-address: 6th Floor, Civil Trade Centre (CTC Mall), Sundhara
story-paragraph-1: On 12th May 2010, a group of passionate young entrepreneurs came together with a bold vision to create a vibrant business community where people support each other, grow together, and succeed for generations to come.
story-paragraph-2: That vision became Constellation Saving and Credit Cooperative Limited - a trusted platform for shared growth, financial empowerment, and strong relationships. We are proudly registered under the Department of Cooperatives and now operate under the Ministry of Land Management, Cooperatives and Poverty Alleviation.
story-paragraph-3: For over a decade, our Board of Directors and management team, backed by staff with 20+ years of experience, have been delivering professional, transparent, and member-friendly services. Our office is fully equipped with modern facilities, ensuring every member enjoys comfort, efficiency, and a homely atmosphere.
contact-address-2: Sundhara, Kathmandu Metropolitan City Ward No. 22
ministry-name: Ministry of Land Management, Cooperatives and Poverty Alleviation
foundation-subtitle: The principles that guide our cooperative
mission-content: To create a vibrant business community where people support each other, grow together, and succeed for generations to come. We work with the true spirit of cooperative values - mutual trust, shared success, and community support, delivering professional, transparent, and member-friendly services.
vision-content: At Constellation, you are not just a shareholder - you are a partner in progress. We invite you to engage with us, benefit from our services, and be part of a cooperative family where dreams meet opportunity, and community becomes family. Together, everyone can achieve more.
purpose-1: Create a vibrant business community where people support each other
purpose-2: Promote shared growth and financial empowerment among members
purpose-3: Build strong relationships that last for generations to come
purpose-4: Provide professional, transparent, and member-friendly services
purpose-5: Ensure every member enjoys comfort, efficiency, and homely atmosphere
purpose-6: Foster mutual trust and shared success in our community
purpose-7: Support members as partners in progress, not just shareholders
purpose-8: Create opportunities where dreams meet opportunity and community becomes family
values-subtitle: The principles that guide everything we do
value-desc-mutual-trust: We work with the true spirit of cooperative values - mutual trust, shared success, and community support.
value-desc-community-support: Together, everyone can achieve more. We believe in the power of community and collective growth.
value-desc-financial-empowerment: We provide professional, transparent, and member-friendly services for shared growth and financial empowerment.
value-desc-strong-relationships: Building a trusted platform where people support each other and grow together for generations.
journey-subtitle: Key milestones in our cooperative's growth
milestone-2010-0: Constellation Saving and Credit Cooperative Limited established on 12th May 2010
milestone-2010-1: Registered under Department of Cooperatives (Registration No. 3163/066/067)
milestone-2015-2: Established head office at 6th Floor, Civil Trade Centre (CTC Mall), Sundhara
milestone-2020-3: Expanded services with experienced management team (20+ years experience)
milestone-2024-4: Operating under Ministry of Land Management, Cooperatives and Poverty Alleviation
milestone-2025-5: Continuing to serve members with modern facilities and homely atmosphere
community-impact-subtitle: How we're making a difference in our community
financial-literacy-desc: Educational workshops and seminars to improve financial knowledge and skills among community members.
business-development-desc: Supporting local entrepreneurs through business exhibitions, directories, and networking opportunities.
cultural-programs-desc: Organizing traditional events like Deusi-Bhailo, festivals, sports activities, and community gatherings.
